website_summaries.verdict: A quality blackhead remover kit with five handy tools, designed with sensitive skin in mind.
pros: We love the ergonomic, anti-slip grips on the handles which make them more comfortable to use for long periods
The included 10x magnification mirror makes it easier to locate and remove blackheads
cons: Some buyers say the tweezers don't have smooth enough edges

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't own one of these kits before. The tools are very easy to use, easy to clean. They work for those pimples and my husband's ingrown hairs. The only thing I have to complain about was the case. There are moments when I can't open it and there times it opens really easy. The foam(s) that hold the tools came off and they don't hold them put.
customer_reviews.author: NEGRON

customer_reviews.title: A pimple pickers dream
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp tools with plenty of options to chose from makes this kit perfect for anyone who needs (or wants) to take care of pesky pimples, black heads and ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Burnett

customer_reviews.title: ... bud" so I ordered this and it works just fine. No big problems before and none now
customer_reviews.text: Doctor told me to monitor certain facial things to "nip 'em in the bud" so I ordered this and it works just fine. No big problems before and none now. Can be used too much so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: M squared

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Great tools! Just remember to sanitize before and after every use! Does not leave marks on the skin if you are kind to your self.
customer_reviews.author: Madi M.

customer_reviews.title: What I did get was good
customer_reviews.text: Came missing one of the tools. What I did get was good though
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jones

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product and GREAT value!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product and well constructed. It does not show in the ad, but it comes with a zip locked makeup case. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonda R

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I only use a couple of the tools most of the time, but they have been pretty handy. My biggest issue with these tools is that a few of them have sharp edges and end up digging into the skin more than squeezing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It does exactly what it is suppose to do and is very easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers are worthless
customer_reviews.text: Poor gripping quality on the tweezers. Poor quality all around. Came in a cute polka dot bag....of which the zipper immediately broke.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Perschbacher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use tools that come in a nice holder
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money! The tweezers do not come together to make blackhead removal efficient. Complete waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Although we mainly use one if the "tweezers", this set was very useful, just as expected reading most of the previous reviews. The package arrived in time and was in perfect conditions.
customer_reviews.author: nicky o

customer_reviews.title: Deep acne
customer_reviews.text: Needle is not sharp at all. The rest of the tool are more or less ok
customer_reviews.author: Alex769

customer_reviews.title: Fewer trips to the Dr!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these get super tiny heads to target only a single pore and create minimal damage to the skin! Good kit!
customer_reviews.author: Rawad Habib

customer_reviews.title: Good tools to fight blackhead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool because this set had different tools which can deal with different skin problems.I am so happy I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to come with instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent product, but it did not have any instructions for usage and hurt my skin a few times.
customer_reviews.author: CuteNessie

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you are a parent - the ultimate "get it out" kit
customer_reviews.text: Don't use safety pins or your fingers when trying to remove a pimple, splinter or any other skin issue. This kit includes excellent tools to remove splinters, pustules, comedones, and to keep the tools clear and clean. Bought three - one for my teenage daughter, myself and elderly mother to make sure they have tools if there are issues with an ingrown hair or an insect. The tweezers are excellent for tiny item removal.
customer_reviews.author: TaBuHax

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were very poorly made and were ineffective. The metal was not smooth and had sharp edges. Also I am not sure if these are actually even made entirely out of stainless steal because they caused my skin to brea out in a hives rash on my hands where I was holding them as well as on my face. I would definitely not recommend this product and would advice against purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Eyes

customer_reviews.title: not useful
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, just a bunch of random tools. Save your money for the DermaSuction (search for it). That product actually works. Yes, I have one, and yes, it really helped.
customer_reviews.author: S. Funk

customer_reviews.title: ... one tool in all of them that I found useful. The zipper broke on the little bag/pouch the ...
customer_reviews.text: There is only one tool in all of them that I found useful. The zipper broke on the little bag/pouch the first day. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for any Pimple Popper!
customer_reviews.text: As a bump buster..... this is MY kit and no one touches it. Having the proper tools really help with damage that may happen when trying to pop pimples the old way. Also it’s made with VERY nice material!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lashawn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It's got a little bit of everything, and the pieces are good quality. The pieces have weight to them, and nothing feels flimsy or cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Petra R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well, good quality and works great! 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing ever. I recommend getting a set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these acne tools they remove blackheads and zits great and don't injure my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for me and one for a stocking stuffer very nice
customer_reviews.text: got two one for me and one for a stocking stuffer very nice
customer_reviews.author: christine Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Tools are not well cut/formed and some have jagged edges when their purpose requires them to be smooth so as not to cut when pressed into skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tring4

customer_reviews.title: Not really like. It not easy to take out blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Not really like . It not easy to take out blackheads
customer_reviews.author: vicky chen

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected. All of the instruments came packed safely in a metal tin with bonus gifts. They are of professional quality. Some reviews complained of pooly made instruments, easily damaged with and sharp edges. I didn't find that to be true of the items I received.
customer_reviews.author: Bob's Tacos

product_meta.title: Blackhead and Acne Removal Tool,Best Pimple Extractor Kit to Remover Comedone and Blemish without Risk for Sensitive Skin by Fairyland(100 Cotton Pads + Magnifier)
product_meta.description:
Do you often worry about the blackheads or acne on your face?
Why are these tool to remove blackheads so important and can not to squeeze acne directly by hand?

Here to quotes for a senior buyer's review:Our fingers touch a lot of things every day,even before squeeze acne we have washed our hands,but the bacteria remaining in the nail is no way to completely remove.When we squeeze acne,the bacteria will enter our skin through our fingers or nails,causing skin redness ,ulceration and leaving scars difficult to eliminate.What doctors and dermatologist recommend actually has merit this time around,nails will destroy our skin,we need professional and safe blackhead extractor tool to help us.

How to use these dermatology tools correctly?

1.Wash your face with warm water,or a hot towel attaining for about 2-3 minutes.The main purpose is to soften the acne tissue,open the pores,help to clean up the accumulated toxins.
2.Disinfect the remover tools and the target skin area with alcohol,to ensure the safety of the operation without bacteria infection.
3.Now,you can removing blackhead/Whitehead/acne/pimple/with comedone extractor tools,remember to be gentle.
4.Clean your skin again,and then apply mild moisturizing cream.

What can i do to clean those blackhead extractor?

Because these blackhead removal always exposed in the air,in order to better help us remove the hateful acne and acne,before use need to use hot water and medical alcohol to sterilization.After use,but also need to use alcohol disinfection in a timely,dry and storage.

Package includes:
1 x Metal Case
1 × 5 Pieces Blackhead Remover Tool
100 × Cotton Pad

CAUTION:Before use,please use alcohol disinfection.And to the blackhead needle a bit sharp,when used to pay attention to safety
feature_bullets: ΣMulti-Function Extractor Kit:5 different blackhead removal needles and acne extractor tweezers,help you remove blackheads whitehead popping acne come done pimple and other skin blemishes,make your skin full of natural beauty.Do not need extra high consumption to the beauty salon,you can also shine

ΣAnti-Allergy Material:Blackhead and acne remover tool made of high-density stainless steel,fine workmanship,tweezers perfect seamless alignment.After quality testing,professional surgical grade material,anti-corrosion is not rust,even if the use of longer time will not discolored or bent,without redness or scar,suitable for all kinds of sensitive skin.Easily remove blackheads and facial blemish,very sharp and practical,no extra entanglement,back to your flawless skin

ΣThoughtful Design:Blackhead extractor with fine measurement design,ergonomic anti-skid handle,you can at any time natural to use the blackhead remover tools,with the best power freely control blackhead tweezers or needles,accurate extraction of blackheads and blemishes,to avoid the use of improper injury to the skin.

ΣExtra Bonus:The best awards is partial 10x magnifying glass and 100 cotton pads,give you the most intimate service,allowing you to accurately locate the blemish during use,to minimize the risk of infection,the rapid elimination of acne and pimple

ΣThis is one of indispensable dermatology tools,but it is more economical than blackhead mask,ointment and blackhead cleaner that can be used for several years and will be healthier.It can avoid you long-term suffer from blackhead acne pimple,you need to make better use of it.If you have any questions you can contact us through Amazon,we will do our best to provide you with the best service,what reason to hesitate?
